content.prompt: In sentence 1, the writer is considering changing “The latest…psychology suggest” to better introduce the topic and engage the reader’s attention. Which of the following versions of “The latest…psychology suggest” in sentence 1 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: “Know yourself” is a well-known maxim, but the latest findings in social psychology suggest
Many people would say that self-reflection is an important habit, and the suggestion from the latest findings in social psychology is
Social psychology is a constantly evolving discipline, and its latest findings suggest
